<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ro">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>TITO ULTIMATE RTV</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.2.0/css/all.min.css">
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/hls.js@latest"></script>

    <style>
        :root {
            --bg-grad-start: #202020; --bg-grad-end: #383838;
            --player-bg: #1a1a1a; --text-color: #f0f0f0;
            --accent-radio: #00aaff; --accent-tv: #e44d26;
            --shadow-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
        }
        body {
            font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--bg-grad-start), var(--bg-grad-end));
            color: var(--text-color); display: flex; justify-content: center;
            align-items: center; min-height: 100vh; margin: 0; padding: 20px; box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        .app-container {
            display: flex; width: 1100px; max-width: 98%; height: 600px;
            background-color: var(--player-bg); border-radius: 20px;
            box-shadow: 0 15px 50px var(--shadow-color); overflow: hidden; border: 1px solid #555;
        }
        .player-section {
            flex-basis: 70%; padding: 15px; background-color: #000;
            display: flex; flex-direction: column; position: relative;
        }
        .media-wrapper {
            width: 100%; flex-grow: 1; background-color: #000;
            display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; position: relative;
        }
        #video-player { width: 100%; height: 100%; z-index: 5; background-color: #000; }
        .audio-display {
            width: 100%; height: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center; justify-content: center; z-index: 4;
            background: radial-gradient(circle, #222 0%, #000 100%);
        }
        .audio-display img {
            width: 200px; height: 200px; border-radius: 50%;
            box-shadow: 0 0 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); object-fit: cover;
            border: 5px solid #333;
        }
        .audio-display.playing img { animation: spin 15s linear infinite; }
        .player-info {
            padding-top: 10px; text-align: center; height: 60px;
            background: #000; z-index: 6;
        }
        
        .app-title-container {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 15px;
        }
        .header-logo {
            height: 35px;
            width: 35px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
        }
        #media-name { font-size: 1.5em; font-weight: bold; }
        #media-country { color: #bdc3c7; }

        .playlist-section {
            flex-basis: 30%; padding: 15px; display: flex;
            flex-direction: column; gap: 10px; background-color: #2a2a2a; position: relative;
        }
        .mode-switcher { display: flex; gap: 5px; }
        .mode-switcher button {
            flex: 1; padding: 12px; font-size: 1em; font-weight: bold;
            border: 2px solid #555; border-radius: 8px;
            background-color: #333; color: #aaa; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s;
        }
        .mode-switcher button.active.radio { background-color: var(--accent-radio); color: white; border-color: var(--accent-radio); }
        .mode-switcher button.active.tv { background-color: var(--accent-tv); color: white; border-color: var(--accent-tv); }
        
        #world-clock {
            display: flex; justify-content: space-around; align-items: center;
            padding: 8px 0; font-size: 0.8em; color: #bdc3c7;
            background-color: #2c3e50; border-radius: 8px;
        }

        #country-selector {
            width: 100%; padding: 12px; border-radius: 8px; border: 2px solid #555;
            background-color: #2c3e50; color: white; font-size: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        #media-list {
            list-style: none; padding: 0; margin: 0; overflow-y: auto; flex-grow: 1;
        }
        #media-list::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 8px; }
        #media-list::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background: #2c3e50; border-radius: 4px; }
        #media-list.radio::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: var(--accent-radio); }
        #media-list.tv::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: var(--accent-tv); }
        #media-list li {
            display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 15px; padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; transition: background-color 0.2s ease;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #3a3a3a;
        }
        #media-list li.active.radio { background-color: var(--accent-radio); }
        #media-list li.active.tv { background-color: var(--accent-tv); }
        #media-list img {
            width: 50px; height: 50px; border-radius: 8px;
            object-fit: contain; background-color: #333; flex-shrink: 0;
        }
        #loading-indicator {
            position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
            color: white; font-size: 1.5em; display: none; text-align: center; z-index: 10;
        }
        #loading-indicator i { font-size: 2em; animation: spin 1.5s linear infinite; }
        @keyframes spin { from { transform: rotate(0deg); } to { transform: rotate(360deg); } }

        .app-container.radio-mode #video-player { display: none; }
        .app-container.tv-mode .audio-display { display: none; }

        @media (max-width: 1100px) {
            .app-container { flex-direction: column; height: auto; max-height: 95vh; }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <div id="app-container" class="app-container">
        <div class="player-section">
            <div class="media-wrapper">
                <video id="video-player" controls autoplay muted></video>
                <div class="audio-display">
                    <img id="audio-logo" src="https://i.postimg.cc/9F7p6g5d/radio-tito-logo.png" alt="Logo">
                </div>
                <audio id="audio-player" crossOrigin="anonymous"></audio>
            </div>
            <div class="player-info">
                <div class="app-title-container">
                    <!-- MODIFICARE: Link-ul catre noul logo de pe TikTok -->
                    <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="App Logo" class="header-logo">
                    <h2 id="media-name">TITO ULTIMATE RTV</h2>
                </div>
                <p id="media-country">Alege Radio sau TV, apoi o țară</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="playlist-section">
            <div class="mode-switcher">
                <button id="mode-radio" class="radio"><i class="fas fa-radio"></i> Radio</button>
                <button id="mode-tv" class="tv"><i class="fas fa-tv"></i> TV</button>
            </div>
            <div id="world-clock"></div>
            <select id="country-selector">
                <option value="">Alegeți un mod...</option>
            </select>
            <ul id="media-list"></ul>
            <div id="loading-indicator">
                <i class="fas fa-spinner"></i>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    const appContainer = document.getElementById('app-container');
    const audioPlayer = document.getElementById('audio-player');
    const videoPlayer = document.getElementById('video-player');
    const audioDisplay = document.querySelector('.audio-display');
    const audioLogo = document.getElementById('audio-logo');
    
    const mediaNameEl = document.getElementById('media-name');
    const mediaCountryEl = document.getElementById('media-country');
    const mediaListEl = document.getElementById('media-list');
    
    const countrySelector = document.getElementById('country-selector');
    const loadingIndicator = document.getElementById('loading-indicator');
    
    const modeRadioBtn = document.getElementById('mode-radio');
    const modeTvBtn = document.getElementById('mode-tv');
    const worldClockEl = document.getElementById('world-clock');
    
    const defaultRadioLogo = 'https://i.postimg.cc/9F7p6g5d/radio-tito-logo.png';
    const defaultTvLogo = 'https://i.postimg.cc/pr2C4Hk3/tv-placeholder.png';
    
    const API_URLS = {
        radio: 'https://de1.api.radio-browser.info/json',
        tv_m3u: 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Free-TV/IPTV/master/playlist.m3u8'
    };
    
    let hls;
    let currentMode = 'radio';
    let currentMediaList = [];
    let currentMediaIndex = -1;
    let tvDataCache = null;
    const updateClock = () => {
        const timezones = {
            'București': 'Europe/Bucharest', 'Londra': 'Europe/London',
            'Viena': 'Austria/Wien', 'Tokyo': 'Asia/Tokyo'
        };
        let clockHTML = '';
        for (const [city, zone] of Object.entries(timezones)) {
            try {
                const time = new Date().toLocaleTimeString('ro-RO', { timeZone: zone, hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' });
                clockHTML += `<span>${city}: ${time}</span>`;
            } catch (e) { console.error(`Timezone invalid: ${zone}`); }
        }
        worldClockEl.innerHTML = clockHTML;
    };

    const setMode = async (mode) => {
        currentMode = mode;
        stopAllPlayers();
        mediaListEl.innerHTML = '';
        mediaListEl.className = mode;
        appContainer.classList.remove('radio-mode', 'tv-mode');
        appContainer.classList.add(`${mode}-mode`);
        modeRadioBtn.classList.toggle('active', mode === 'radio');
        modeTvBtn.classList.toggle('active', mode === 'tv');
        mediaNameEl.textContent = 'TITO ULTIMATE RTV';
        mediaCountryEl.textContent = `Selectează o categorie pentru ${mode.toUpperCase()}`;
        await fetchCountries();
    };

    const stopAllPlayers = () => {
        audioPlayer.pause(); audioPlayer.src = '';
        videoPlayer.pause(); videoPlayer.src = '';
        if (hls) hls.destroy();
        audioDisplay.classList.remove('playing');
    };

    const showLoading = (show) => {
        loadingIndicator.style.display = show ? 'flex' : 'none';
    };

    const parseM3uPlaylist = async () => {
        if (tvDataCache) return tvDataCache;
        try {
            const response = await fetch(API_URLS.tv_m3u);
            if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Failed to fetch M3U playlist');
            const m3uText = await response.text();
            const lines = m3uText.split('\n');
            const channels = [];
            for (let i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
                if (lines[i].startsWith('#EXTINF:')) {
                    const info = lines[i];
                    const url = lines[i + 1]?.trim();
                    if (url && url.startsWith('http')) {
                        const nameMatch = info.match(/,(.*)$/);
                        const logoMatch = info.match(/tvg-logo="([^"]*)"/);
                        const groupMatch = info.match(/group-title="([^"]*)"/);
                        channels.push({
                            channel: nameMatch ? nameMatch[1].trim() : 'Unknown Channel',
                            logo: logoMatch ? logoMatch[1] : null,
                            country: groupMatch ? groupMatch[1].trim() : 'General',
                            url: url
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
            tvDataCache = channels;
            return channels;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Critical error fetching M3U:", error);
            mediaListEl.innerHTML = '<li style="justify-content:center; color: #ff6b6b;">Lista TV nu a putut fi încărcată.</li>';
            return [];
        }
    };

    const fetchCountries = async () => {
        showLoading(true);
        countrySelector.innerHTML = '<option value="">Se încarcă categoriile...</option>';
        try {
            if (currentMode === 'radio') {
                const response = await fetch(`${API_URLS.radio}/countries`);
                if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Network response failed');
                const countries = (await response.json()).sort((a,b) => a.name.localeCompare(b.name));
                countrySelector.innerHTML = '<option value="">Alegeți o țară...</option>';
                countries.forEach(country => {
                    if(country.iso_3166_1) {
                        const option = new Option(country.name, country.iso_3166_1);
                        countrySelector.add(option);
                    }
                });
                countrySelector.value = 'RO';
                await fetchMediaByCountry('RO');
            } else {
                const channels = await parseM3uPlaylist();
                if (channels.length === 0) return;
                const countries = [...new Set(channels.map(c => c.country))].sort();
                countrySelector.innerHTML = '<option value="">Alegeți o categorie...</option>';
                countries.forEach(country => {
                    const option = new Option(country, country);
                    countrySelector.add(option);
                });
                const romaniaOption = Array.from(countrySelector.options).find(opt => opt.value === 'Romania');
                if (romaniaOption) countrySelector.value = 'Romania';
                await fetchMediaByCountry(countrySelector.value);
            }
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Eroare la încărcarea țărilor/categoriilor:", error);
            countrySelector.innerHTML = '<option value="">Eroare</option>';
        } finally {
            showLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const fetchMediaByCountry = async (countryCode) => {
        if (!countryCode) { mediaListEl.innerHTML = ''; return; }
        showLoading(true);
        mediaListEl.innerHTML = '';
        try {
            if (currentMode === 'radio') {
                const response = await fetch(`${API_URLS.radio}/stations/bycountrycodeexact/${countryCode}?limit=500&order=clickcount&reverse=true`);
                currentMediaList = await response.json();
            } else {
                currentMediaList = tvDataCache.filter(stream => stream.country === countryCode);
            }
            populateMediaList();
        } catch (error) {
            console.error(`Eroare la încărcarea media pentru ${countryCode}:`, error);
        } finally {
            showLoading(false);
        }
    };

    const populateMediaList = () => {
        if (currentMediaList.length === 0) {
            mediaListEl.innerHTML = '<li style="justify-content:center;">Niciun post public disponibil.</li>';
            return;
        }
        currentMediaList.forEach((item, index) => {
            const li = document.createElement('li');
            li.dataset.index = index;
            const name = currentMode === 'radio' ? item.name : item.channel;
            const logo = currentMode === 'radio' ? item.favicon : item.logo;
            const defaultLogo = currentMode === 'radio' ? defaultRadioLogo : defaultTvLogo;
            li.innerHTML = `<img src="${logo || defaultLogo}" alt="Logo" onerror="this.src='${defaultLogo}'"><div class="media-info"><strong>${name}</strong></div>`;
            li.addEventListener('click', () => loadAndPlay(index));
            mediaListEl.appendChild(li);
        });
    };

    const loadAndPlay = (index) => {
        if (index < 0 || index >= currentMediaList.length) return;
        currentMediaIndex = index;
        const item = currentMediaList[index];
        stopAllPlayers();
        if (currentMode === 'radio') {
            // Cand se da play la radio, titlul aplicatiei ramane, dar se schimba numele postului sub el
            mediaNameEl.textContent = item.name;
            mediaCountryEl.textContent = item.country;
            audioLogo.src = item.favicon || defaultRadioLogo;
            audioPlayer.src = item.url_resolved;
            audioPlayer.play();
        } else {
            // Cand se da play la TV, titlul afiseaza numele canalului
            mediaNameEl.textContent = item.channel;
            mediaCountryEl.textContent = item.country || '';
            const streamUrl = item.url;
            if (Hls.isSupported() && streamUrl.includes('.m3u8')) {
                hls = new Hls();
                hls.loadSource(streamUrl);
                hls.attachMedia(videoPlayer);
                hls.on(Hls.Events.MANIFEST_PARSED, () => videoPlayer.play().catch(e => console.error("Autoplay blocat", e)));
            } else {
                 videoPlayer.src = streamUrl;
                 videoPlayer.play().catch(e => console.error("Autoplay blocat", e));
            }
        }
        updateActiveMediaInList();
    };
    
    const updateActiveMediaInList = () => {
        document.querySelectorAll('#media-list li').forEach((item) => {
            const isActive = parseInt(item.dataset.index) === currentMediaIndex;
            item.classList.toggle('active', isActive);
            item.classList.toggle(currentMode, isActive);
        });
    };
    
    modeRadioBtn.addEventListener('click', () => setMode('radio'));
    modeTvBtn.addEventListener('click', () => setMode('tv'));
    countrySelector.addEventListener('change', () => fetchMediaByCountry(countrySelector.value));
    audioPlayer.onplaying = () => audioDisplay.classList.add('playing');
    audioPlayer.onpause = () => audioDisplay.classList.remove('playing');

    const initializeApp = async () => {
        updateClock();
        setInterval(updateClock, 60000);
        await setMode('radio');
    };
    initializeApp();
});
</script>
</body>
</html>
